trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies configuration options for an event source.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

None of the special configuration options are enabled.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source throws an exception when an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.
